team.title: Kerry Rea
team.content: As the founder of GovEvents and GovWhitePapers, Kerry is on a mission to help businesses interact with and serve the government. With 25+ years of experience in the information technology and government industries, Kerry drives the overall strategy and oversees operations for both companies. She has also served in executive marketing roles at a number of government IT providers.
team.excerpt: As the founder of GovEvents and GovWhitePapers, Kerry is on a mission to help businesses interact with and serve the government. With 25+ years of experience in the information technology and government industries, Kerry drives the overall strategy and oversees operations for both companies. She has also served in executive marketing roles at a number…
team.fun_fact: Playing golf, I have had two holes-in-one (and I am really not very good!)

team.title: Stephanie Gravel
team.content: Stephanie uses her 20+ years of government market experience to design promotional campaigns which extend her clients’ goal of reaching the public sector. She ensures that each campaign is developed with an eye toward the client’s desired audience, timeline, and budget to exceed expectations and drive business and missions. Stephanie previously worked at Booz Allen Hamilton as a consultant to NASA and NSA.

team.fun_fact: I am a Washington Capitals super fan!

team.title: Aletia Martin
team.content: Aletia’s passion for success, along with her marketing skills and experience, enhance the value and results of our client campaigns. She has 20 years of experience in marketing and sales for small and large companies. Aletia enjoys the challenges that arise in marketing a service or product and loves brainstorming, strategizing, and collaborating on the best ways to achieve campaign objectives.

team.fun_fact: When I’m not running my daughter to and from jujitsu, you can likely find me binge-watching HGTV.

team.title: Ivey Taylor
team.content: Ivey is a seasoned social and content marketer. Her diverse experience in copywriting, digital advertising, and social optimization combined with a passion for developing engaging content, ensure that our social media campaigns attract the right audience to drive performance and quantifiable results.
team.excerpt: Ivey is a seasoned social and content marketer. Her diverse experience in copywriting, digital advertising, and social optimization combined with a passion for developing engaging content, ensure that our social media campaigns attract the right audience to drive performance and quantifiable results.
team.fun_fact: I am a huge fan of podcasts. My favorites are Hidden Brain and Invisibilia.

team.title: Donna Munday
team.content: Donna’s marketing know-how and commitment to excellence in client service underpin her work within the GovWhitePapers team. She is dedicated to ensuring that every member, client and colleague has a painless and seamless experience when they need support or assistance.
team.excerpt: Donna’s marketing know-how and commitment to excellence in client service underpin her work within the GovWhitePapers team. She is dedicated to ensuring that every member, client and colleague has a painless and seamless experience when they need support or assistance.
team.fun_fact: I volunteer in animal rescue and have two dogs and three cats. My first rescue was a mouse when I was in elementary school.

team.title: Sarah Parrish
team.content: Sarah’s 15+ years of experience in education provides a unique background to frame and promote content in a way that informs and educates the government market.  She collaborates with clients to design and carry out campaigns that extend the reach of their message, building relationships through the effort to ensure plans are carried out successfully.

team.fun_fact: I love learning new things and consider myself a life-long learner!

team.title: Amy Decker
team.content: Amy brings a depth of experience supporting the marketing campaigns of events and related service industries through advertising and social media. She puts the puzzle together for clients, ensuring campaigns exceed expectations with the right mix of strategies and proper planning. She stays in constant contact with clients, reviewing results in real time to ensure all campaigns are optimized to meet goals.
